CutSceneText.Text: They call me Bellus Achibald. I am the director of the Tijerid Military Academy and adviser to Mikael Reol.
My Information Officers have already told me about you. You've done a great job.
Sadly, Mikael is currently on a retreat and is unable to welcome you in person...
But he expressly ordered that you should be rewarded.
I have already asked Knight Teila to take care of this. He will be waiting outside for you.
One more thing... It's deeply irritating that nobody knows where Yurid has fled to.
Please let me know if you find out where he is, or if you hear any news about him.
As you know, Tijerid's reputation is at stake. For this reason, I ask you never to speak of this issue.
